Module guigame

Package guigame.gui.panes

Contains implementations of specific JComponents with the game's color scheme and custom logic.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    GUIDialog
    Implementation of JDialog with specified colors.
    GUIFrame
    Implementation of a JFrame for specific colors and eventually other parameters.
    GUILabel
    A Label which has a fore- and background from Constants.
    GUIOptionPane
    Implementation of GUIDialog: Option pane to ask the user a question.
    GUIPanel
    A JPanel with predefined colors and an updated removeAll-method.
    GUISlider
    Implementation of JSlider with the game's default colors and a ball as slider-thumb (knob).
    GUISliderUI
    Implementation of BasicSliderUI: style of a GUISlider.
    GUITextField
    Implementation of JTextField with the right colors.
